Year: Footnote

Classification of waste by classes of hazard is done in accordance with the relevant legislation of RA and the Classifier, which was last amended in 2010. That's why the indicators for the years preceding 2010 and the years following 2010 are not compatible.
5% of total hazardous waste.

The figures partially consider utilization or disposal of waste accumulated during previous years. Besides, hazardous waste treated or disposed during the year includes hazardous waste exported during the year.
Estimate.
Waste from hospitals only.
Data refer to biomedical waste.
Estimated data.
Data is based on amount of Clinical waste disposed off at the landfill site through incineration. It is for seven landfills located in the most populated centres in the country.
Pathological solid waste collected from hospitals and clinics for incineration.

Partial total.
